Topic.Title: ADEP a good takeover target for yahoo

Message.Msg: [" help labor become cheaper and US industry compete with China"]...... so-call cheaper foreign items only breeds cheaper wages.... America didn't have 46 million people on food stamps and 20 million unemployed in 1975.... that was the last year America had a trade surplus.... The currency of a country is the fuel for that country to make stuff...... Total US Government Debt in 1975 was a mere $533 billion... 38 years of dollars(fuel) leaving America and being held in foreign hands.... 6 to 1 trade deficit with China... STOP the flow of US dollars(fuel) and America will not have 46 million on food stamps and 20 million looking for work.... It ain't about making labor cheaper.... it's about the three words Freedom, Liberty and Hope..... because once the printing of dollars(debt) stop.... all that fuel (US dollars) that those foreigners hold.... they will also be holding the balls of Uncle Sam and every person in this union of states that call themselves an American. One super cargo ship pollutes as much as 50 million automobiles.... Now... Do you know the number of cargo ships Wal*Mart had commissioned years ago? Do you know where the Global Procurement Office for Wal*Mart is located? Do you know the percentage of foreign items Wal*Mart puts in the stores in CHINA? You young people had better wake your butt up and stop thumbing the sh!! out of those gadgets.... ans soon.
